SEARCH
Package entity

Class Camp

Object
Camp
public class Camp extends Object
Represents a camp where all attributes are private. Uses LocalDate to store the date information Uses ArrayList to store list of attendees, committee members, enquiries and suggestions.

  • Constructor Details

    • Camp

      public Camp(int campID, String name, LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate, LocalDate regCloseDate, Faculty openToFaculty, String location, int totalSlots, int commSlots, String description, boolean visibleToStudents, Staff staffInCharge)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      campID - unqiue integer
      name - type String
      startDate - type Date
      endDate - type Date
      regCloseDate - type Date
      openToFaculty - enum type Faculty to indicate which faculty this camp is created in
      location - type String
      totalSlots - total number of slots available for the camp
      commSlots - total number of committe member slots available for the camp
      description - type String
      visibleToStudents - boolean value indicating whether the camp is visible to students

      public boolean hasAttendeeSlots()
